p: The plant samples from Curculigo species were collected during 2018â€“2019 from four regencies in Sulawesi Island, Indonesia: Barru, Maros, Gowa, and Sinjai. The coordinates, plant parts, sample code, collection time (season), and altitude are summarized in Table 1, and the geographical locations are shown in Figure S7. All samples were identified based on local knowledge and by comparing them to the published flora and voucher specimens stored at the Tropical Biopharmaca Research Center, IPB University, Indonesia.
